channel.title: Arab Spring on David Broska
channel.description: Recent content in Arab Spring on David Broska

item.title: Economic Origins and Outcomes of the Arab Spring
item.description: 1 The Revolution Constraint 2 Evidence from the Arab Spring 2.1 The case of Egypt 2.2 A comparative perspective 3 Conclusion The term Arab Spring denotes a variety of regime protests, uprisings and armed rebellions, which differ from each other in several respects. On the one hand, they differ in their extent, ranging from local to nationwide activities, and on the other hand in the achievement of different results: from minor state concessions to appease the population, to stronger reactions in which the government was overthrown.
